title: Willie Robertson Is Making GAINS
description:
Willie channels his inner Si to bring you some of his favorite stories about the Duck Call Room crew, Robertson family pranks, and his recent effort to hit the gym. Willie reveals why Si's hand-me-downs had a distinct odor after he got ahold of them, and that reminds Godwin of his air addiction. John-David explains why Willie nicknamed him "Nervous Pervis," and Martin lays down the law about imitation burgers. Then, get ready for big laughs as Willie describes his attempt to fire Si, one of his favorite Godwin stories, how Martin really ended up at Duck Commander, and how John-David "negotiated" his hourly pay.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
